appName: FLY - A Google Earth Flight Sim
displayName: FLY - A Google Earth Flight Sim
display_name: FLY - A Google Earth Flight Sim
display_long_description:
# New!
🛎️ AI Concierge (Premium Add-On)

- Listen and reply in ANY language

- Act as a tour guide

- Search and take you anywhere

- So much more

# Features


👥 Multiplayer with up to 8 People


🔍 Improved Search  

🌏 Travel Through Google Street View

🔖 Bookmarks  

🌇 Dynamic and Adjustable Time of Day  

🐉New Dragon Avatars (Premium Add-On)

🌌 Unlockable Sky Boxes  

🚁 Mode 2 Drone Controls 

📻 Expanded Radio Stations  

Embark on an extraordinary journey with FLY, and redefine the way you explore our planet. Powered by Google's cutting-edge 3D Maps Tiles, FLY lets you soar through the skies and witness the world's wonders like never before. From the ground all the way to the edge of space, you can truly Fly for the first time alone or with friends.

[media]

**Global Exploration:** Fly taps into Google's vast repository of 3D tiles, offering a true-to-life representation of Earth. Traverse majestic landscapes, iconic landmarks, and hidden gems from the comfort of your home. Whether it's the towering peaks of the Himalayas, the bustling streets of Tokyo, or triumphs of human engineering like the Eiffel Tower in Paris, the world is yours to discover.
[media]
**Unique Motion in Flight:**  Enjoy a seamless and intuitive flying experience designed for comfort first. Soar over mountains, glide through valleys, and experience the thrill of flight.

[media]
Unleash your inner adventurer with Fly – and experience the joys of Google Earth with just the power of your Quest headset.
